QuestData.Title: Safety in Numbers
QuestData.Description: I've taught you all that is practical for now.$B$BIt is time we joined with the other survivors. The others mentioned that King Greymane and his royal guard are just south of here.$B$BThe others are going to need the aid of the Light in these troubling times.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane in the military district.
